yacl.viewboboptions.title: Custom View Bobbing
yacl.viewboboptions.show_in_options.desc: Whether to also show the sliders in the Vanilla Video Options Menu.
yacl.viewboboptions.separate_bobs.label: Separate Bobs
yacl.viewboboptions.separate_bobs.descri: Separates the Hand Bobbing, and the Camera Bobbing.
yacl.viewboboptions.all_bobbing_strength: How much the hand model and the camera model shake when moving.
yacl.viewboboptions.hand_bobbing_strengt: How much the hand model shakes when moving.
yacl.viewboboptions.camera_bobbing_stren: How much the screen shakes when moving.
yacl.viewboboptions.item_overrides.label: Item Bobbing Overrides
yacl.viewboboptions.item_overrides.descr: Items to disable hand bobbing when being held.
options.sodium.viewboboptions.all_bobbin: How much the hand model and the camera model shakes when moving.
options.sodium.viewboboptions.hand_bobbi: How much the hand model shakes when moving.
options.sodium.viewboboptions.camera_bob: How much the screen shakes when moving.
options.vanilla.viewboboptions.all_bobbi: How much the hand model and the camera model shakes when moving.
options.vanilla.viewboboptions.hand_bobb: How much the hand model shakes when moving.
options.vanilla.viewboboptions.camera_bo: How much the screen shakes when moving.
